slide.description: No Bones for Halftones was an annual project where artists came together with the community for a free, one night, screenprinting giveaway event. This website informs the community, highlights details of the event, promotes the artists who participate and builds anticipation with continually updated content.
slide.footnote: Credits: Design and content created in collaboration with Michelle Cheney.
